txt.en: 'Thank you for rescuing me! The Corsairs are fearsome....'
'Corsairs in Lamedon! Can you believe it? Thank you for helping me escape, friend.'
'I hate those Corsairs. They are making a right mess of everything!'
Villagers can be found trapped inside their home in Lothgobel, in central Lamedon.\n\nYou should free the villagers who were left behind.
